org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

类 InstanceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.InstanceManager

  • public class InstanceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple manager that keeps track of which TaskManager are available and alive.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private java.util.Set<ResourceID> deadHosts
      Set of hosts that were present once and have died
      private java.util.List<InstanceListener> instanceListeners
      Listeners that want to be notified about availability and disappearance of instances
      private boolean isShutdown
      Flag marking the system as shut down
      private java.lang.Object lock
      Global lock
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private java.util.Map<InstanceID,Instance> registeredHostsById
      Set of hosts known to run a task manager that are thus able to execute tasks (by ID).
      private java.util.Map<ResourceID,Instance> registeredHostsByResource
      Set of hosts known to run a task manager that are thus able to execute tasks (by ResourceID).
      private int totalNumberOfAliveTaskSlots
      The total number of task slots that the system has

      • LOG

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • lock

        private final java.lang.Object lock
        Global lock

      • registeredHostsById

        private final java.util.Map<InstanceID,Instance> registeredHostsById
        Set of hosts known to run a task manager that are thus able to execute tasks (by ID).

      • registeredHostsByResource

        private final java.util.Map<ResourceID,Instance> registeredHostsByResource
        Set of hosts known to run a task manager that are thus able to execute tasks (by ResourceID).

      • deadHosts

        private final java.util.Set<ResourceID> deadHosts
        Set of hosts that were present once and have died

      • instanceListeners

        private final java.util.List<InstanceListener> instanceListeners
        Listeners that want to be notified about availability and disappearance of instances

      • totalNumberOfAliveTaskSlots

        private int totalNumberOfAliveTaskSlots
        The total number of task slots that the system has

        Flag marking the system as shut down

    • 方法详细资料

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()

      • reportHeartBeat

        public boolean reportHeartBeat(InstanceID instanceId)

      • registerTaskManager

        public InstanceID registerTaskManager(TaskManagerGateway taskManagerGateway,
                                      TaskManagerLocation taskManagerLocation,
                                      HardwareDescription resources,
                                      int numberOfSlots)
        Registers a task manager. Registration of a task manager makes it available to be used for the job execution.
        参数:
        taskManagerGateway - gateway to the task manager
        taskManagerLocation - Location info of the TaskManager
        resources - Hardware description of the TaskManager
        numberOfSlots - Number of available slots on the TaskManager
        返回:
        The assigned InstanceID of the registered task manager

      • unregisterTaskManager

        public void unregisterTaskManager(InstanceID instanceId,
                                  boolean terminated)
        Unregisters the TaskManager with the given instance id. Unregistering means to mark the given instance as dead and notify InstanceListener about the dead instance.
        参数:
        instanceId - TaskManager which is about to be marked dead.

      • unregisterAllTaskManagers

        public void unregisterAllTaskManagers()
        Unregisters all currently registered TaskManagers from the InstanceManager.

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered(InstanceID instanceId)
